snippet.title: Great Escape for the Atari 2600
snippet.description:
The game isn't bad, but it's damn close to it...

Sometimes it is hard to hit anything, the controls aren't the best and it is hard to stop once you are at full speed.

That a mothership...a REALLY big one...is chasing you gives the game some originality. You will sometimes get into panic though.
